title: Teen's generation prepares for climate adaptation
description: Teen's generation prepares for climate adaptation
content:
Scenario: Teen's generation prepares for climate adaptation
    Given Jasmine's generation will face climate change impacts
    And bioregional resilience requires preparation and adaptation
    When bioregional_elohim engages climate preparation
    Then it should help her understand local climate vulnerabilities
    And support her developing adaptive capabilities
    And recognize her climate preparation as care for future self and community
    And connect her to bioregional climate adaptation networks
    And value her generation's work to build climate resilience
    And support realistic engagement with ecological challenges her generation inherits
